author: tobiwo
content:
Good morning, may I ask some questions with regards to maxEB changes planned for pectra (I know a lot of stuff is under discussion)?

1. Custom ceiling: If I set a custom ceiling at 60ETH and I deposit 30 on top of the already present 32, the 2 extra ETH will be withdrawed in the next withdrawal (without setting compound credentials)
2. What happens in this case if I set compounding credentials?
3. How will the process for setting 0x02 credentials look like? Similar like setting 0x01? So just another withdrawal credential update?
4. If a user activates compounding and set a ceiling at e.g. 60 ETH -> if the ceiling is reached after some time will everything above 60 ETH withdrawed again?
